org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.core.driver

Class WebSocketEventDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.core.driver.WebSocketEventDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IncomingFrames

    public class WebSocketEventDriver
extends Object
implements IncomingFrames
    Responsible for routing the internally generated events destined for a specific WebSocket instance to whatever choice of development style the developer has used to wireup their specific WebSocket implementation.

    Supports WebSocket instances that either implement WebSocketListener or have used the @WebSocket annotation.

    There will be an instance of the WebSocketEventDriver per connection.
